ygData.subject: Re: RE: Hey this sounded interesting.. *Time to KABOING ??*
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm. Never had anyone have trouble finding my body, It s usually right beside the other 3 or 4. And the SRo gate is a lot closer so why the heck would you
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Oct 04/99, James Schuldes <jgs@...> wrote:
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> or....
> group playing in lower guk. (and they have a lev 33 cleric)
> bard dies.
> Bard sits in Hk & mem's songs while party looks for corpse.
> Party can't find corpse.
> Party say - start running!
>
> (Wizard takes pity and gate bard from North Karana to Cazic Thule - G'Luck
> in the maze! Train to zone!)

Hmm. Never had anyone have trouble finding my body, It's usually right
beside the other 3 or 4. And the SRo gate is a lot closer so why the
heck would you gate to cazic? Most of the wizards I play with will be
happy to come gate you if you really need to come back, it's not like
they have much else to do while they wait for recovery.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
